meanings.definition: Producing only one offspring at a time.
meanings.sent1: The uniparous rabbit had a single baby bunny.
meanings.sent2: The uniparous cat gave birth to a lone kitten.
meanings.sent3: The uniparous squirrel's family tree was quite simple.
meanings.sent4: The uniparous tree bore a solitary fruit, standing out in the orchard.
meanings.sent5: The uniparous penguin's parenting style was focused on one chick at a time.

meanings.definition: Relating to an organism that gives birth to only one offspring at a time.
meanings.sent1: The uniparous seahorse carries its young in a unique way.
meanings.sent2: The uniparous elephant nurtures its single calf with great care.
meanings.sent3: The uniparous giraffe's baby shower was a small affair.
meanings.sent4: The uniparous starfish seemed content with its solo parenting duties.
meanings.sent5: The uniparous seagull's nest held only one precious egg.
